resources.string: This Application does not support landscape view. \n Please rotate the device vertically.

Project Unknown is an arcade game.Your purpose in the game is to get the best score that you can by going through the game.Getting higher and higher, the blocks start moving faster and more obsticles appear. This is my first game so I hope that you like it. 





Copyright by Valentin Dimitrov (studied software engineering in TUES-Bulgaria.)
